casebody.data:
LOUIS M. CARLINI, PLAINTIFF-PETITIONER, v. CURTISS-WRIGHT CORPORATION, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Messrs. David & Albert L. Cohn and Mr. Daniel Crystal for the petitioner. Messrs. Yauch & Fagan and Mr. Frank J. Peterpaul for the respondent. April 3, 1962.

See same case below: 71 N. J. Super. 101.
